successes.title: Filastruder: A robust, inexpensive filament extruder.
successes.description: Create your own low-cost, quality filament at home!

Pledges.description: Thank you for your contribution. Your name will be on our website in a special thank you to our kickstarter community page, AND a bottle opener printed using filament from the Filastruder.
We've partnered with OS Printing LLC to bring you ABS (Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene) pellets! This reward gets you 4 lbs of ABS pellets delivered to your door.
2 lbs. of natural ABS filament produced on a Filastruder.
Full Filastruder Kit. Everything you need to assemble your own Filastruder, AND 1lb of ABS pellets.
